```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(BiocStyle)
```

# Shiny settings

We load the `r CRANpkg("shiny")` package and set up the maximal file size upload limit to 1GB.

```{r}
library(shiny)
options(shiny.maxRequestSize=1024^3)
```

# Launch the app itself

Load iSEE and launch an empty app.

```{r}
library(iSEE)
iSEE()
```
